items.title: AI empowers criminals to launch ‘customized attacks at scale’—but could also help firms fortify their defenses, say tech industry leaders
items.description: Generative AI and more digital connections are opening up new avenues for cyberattacks.

items.title: Goldman Sachs CEO: AI’s opportunity is enormous, but ‘there will be winners and losers’
items.description: David Solomon sees artificial intelligence as a major catalyst for U.S. economic growth—but warns that the path ahead won’t be a straight line.

items.title: The bloodbath in stocks was ‘the end of the cutting season,’ BofA says: Now we’re on alert for the ‘fail risks’ of 2025
items.description: No major central banks are expected to cut rates again this year, BofA predicts.

items.title: Meta’s $27 billion bet turns AI compute into Wall Street’s hottest new investment
items.description: As the AI data center build out charges ahead at full speed, a new asset class is emerging.
